mapper.select: select a.Id, b.CName as 'UpdateUserName',convert(varchar(100),a.UpdateDate,20) as 'UpdateDate',a.Remark from Examine a join SystemUser b on a.CreateUserId = b.Id where a.ExamineType = '2' ORDER by a.UpdateDate desc
